name: Speedy Alchemist
description:
In a role or an alchemist you have 90 seconds to transform all your ingredients into potions. The less ingredients you have the more score you get!

Mix colors to create new ingredients and use them to cook delicious potions.

Speedy Alchemist was made for blackthornprod game jam in 1 week with a theme “Less is more”. I wrote a post mortem which will be here https://esosek.itch.io/speedy-alchemist/devlog/217080/post-mortem

Hope you enjoy and thanks you for playing!

How to play: Drag and drop ingredients into cauldron and mix them either into another ingredient or into potions. Every potion requires different ingredients.

Controls: Mouse
